an5.8:1.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu cavati, nappatiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:1.3: Assaddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappatiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:1.4: Ahiriko, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappatiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:1.5: Anottappī, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappatiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:1.6: Kusīto, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappatiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:1.7: Duppañño, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappatiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu cavati, nappatiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:2.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu na cavati, patiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:2.3: Saddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, patiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:2.4: Hirīmā, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, patiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:2.5: Ottappī, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, patiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:2.6: Āraddhavīriyo, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, patiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:2.7: Paññavā, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, patiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:2.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu na cavati, patiṭṭhāti saddhamme”ti.
